languages.text: "Лишь вам я готова признаться — бытие {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}новатора{/g} пугает меня и претит. Как могу я управляться целым Домом, если даже собственные силы мне не подвластны?! Я... Я лишь благодарна, что вы всегда были рядом и подсказывали мне верный путь. Благодарю, Вольный Торговец. И почту за честь и далее править ваш корабль сквозь Океан Душ — пока вы не решите обратного.

traits.locale_text: "Лишь вам я готова признаться — бытие новатора пугает меня и претит. Как могу я управляться целым Домом, если даже собственные силы мне не подвластны?! Я... Я лишь благодарна, что вы всегда были рядом и подсказывали мне верный путь. Благодарю, Вольный Торговец. И почту за честь и далее править ваш корабль сквозь Океан Душ — пока вы не решите обратного.
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "You are the only one who I trust to hear this confession — the thought of being {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} both frightens and sickens me. How can I manage an entire House if I cannot even control my powers? I... I am just grateful to you for always being close and guiding me to the right path. Thank you, Rogue Trader. It will be an honour to keep guiding your vessel through the Sea of Souls — until you decide otherwise."
languages.original_text: "Лишь вам я готова признаться — бытие {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}новатора{/g} пугает меня и претит. Как могу я управляться целым Домом, если даже собственные силы мне не подвластны?! Я... Я лишь благодарна, что вы всегда были рядом и подсказывали мне верный путь. Благодарю, Вольный Торговец. И почту за честь и далее править ваш корабль сквозь Океан Душ — пока вы не решите обратного.

traits.locale_text: "You are the only one who I trust to hear this confession — the thought of being a novator both frightens and sickens me. How can I manage an House if I cannot even control my powers?! I... I am just grateful to you for always being close and guiding me to the right path. Thank you, Rogue Trader. It will be an honor to keep guiding your vessel through the Ocean of Souls — until you decide otherwise."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am ready to confess — only to you — that becoming a Novator frightens and disgusts me. How can I rule the whole House if even my own powers are not subject to me?! I... I am incredibly grateful that you are always there and show me the right path. Thank you, Rogue Trader. I will be jonored to continue guiding your voidship through the Sea of Souls — until you decide otherwise.
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are the only one who I trust to hear this confession — the thought of being a novator both frightens and sickens me. How can I manage an House if I cannot even control my powers?! I... I am just grateful to you for always being close and guiding me to the right path. Thank you, Rogue Trader. It will be an honor to keep guiding your vessel through the Ocean of Souls — until you decide otherwise."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are the only one who I trust to hear this confession — the thought of being Novator both frightens and sickens me. How can I manage an entire House if I cannot even control my powers? I... I am just grateful to you for always being close and guiding me to the right path. Thank you, Rogue Trader. It will be an honor to keep guiding your vessel through the Ocean of Souls — until you decide otherwise."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are the only one who I trust to hear this confession — the thought of being Novator both frightens and sickens me. How can I manage an entire House if I cannot even control my powers? I... I am just grateful to you for always being close and guiding me to the right path. Thank you, Rogue Trader. It will be an honor to keep guiding your vessel through the Ocean of Souls — until you decide otherwise."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are the only one who I trust to hear this confession — the thought of being {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} both frightens and sickens me. How can I manage an entire House if I cannot even control my powers? I... I am just grateful to you for always being close and guiding me to the right path. Thank you, Rogue Trader. It will be an honour to keep guiding your vessel through the Sea of Souls — until you decide otherwise."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “你是我唯一信任的人，我只敢把我的心声说给你听。一想到要成为{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}大族长{/g}，我感觉既恐惧、又震惊。我甚至连我自己的力量都控制不了，我何德何能，竟然要管理整个家族？我……我真的很感谢你一直能陪在我身边，引导我走向正确的道路。谢谢你，行商浪人。只要你依然愿意，我就会继续引导你的舰船穿越灵魂之海，这是我的荣幸。”
languages.original_text: "You are the only one who I trust to hear this confession — the thought of being {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} both frightens and sickens me. How can I manage an entire House if I cannot even control my powers? I... I am just grateful to you for always being close and guiding me to the right path. Thank you, Rogue Trader. It will be an honour to keep guiding your vessel through the Sea of Souls — until you decide otherwise."

traits.locale_text: “你是我唯一信任的人，我只敢把我的心声说给你听。一想到要成为{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}大族长{/g}，我感觉既恐惧、又震惊。我甚至连我自己的力量都控制不了，我何德何能，竟然要管理整个家族？我……我真的很感谢你一直能陪在我身边，引导我走向正确的道路。谢谢你，行商浪人。只要你依然愿意，我就会继续引导你的舰船穿越灵魂之海，这是我的荣幸。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "You are the only one who I trust to hear this confession — the thought of being Novator both frightens and sickens me. How can I manage an entire House if I cannot even control my powers? I... I am just grateful to you for always being close and guiding me to the right path. Thank you, Rogue Trader. It will be an honour to keep guiding your vessel through the Sea of Souls — until you decide otherwise."

languages.text: «Es la única persona en la que confío para que escuche esta confesión: la idea de ser {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} me aterra y me pone enferma. ¿Cómo voy a dirigir toda una casa si no puedo ni controlar mis poderes? Yo... Le estoy agradecida por su proximidad y por guiarme hacia lo correcto. Gracias, Comerciante Independiente. Será un honor guiar su nave por el mar de almas, hasta que usted decida lo contrario».
languages.original_text: "You are the only one who I trust to hear this confession — the thought of being {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} both frightens and sickens me. How can I manage an entire House if I cannot even control my powers? I... I am just grateful to you for always being close and guiding me to the right path. Thank you, Rogue Trader. It will be an honour to keep guiding your vessel through the Sea of Souls — until you decide otherwise."

traits.locale_text: «Es la única persona en la que confío para que escuche esta confesión: la idea de ser {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} me aterra y me pone enferma. ¿Cómo voy a dirigir toda una casa si no puedo ni controlar mis poderes? Yo... Le estoy agradecida por su proximidad y por guiarme hacia lo correcto. Gracias, Comerciante Independiente. Será un honor guiar su nave por el mar de almas, hasta que usted decida lo contrario».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「この告白を聞いても構わないと信頼できるのはあなただけです…{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}ノベイター{/g}になることを考えると、怖くもあり、気持ち悪くもあります。自分の力さえコントロールできないのに、どうやって家全体を管理できるのでしょうか？私は…私は、いつも近くにいてくれて正しい道へ導いてくださるあなたに感謝しています。ありがとうございます、ローグトレーダー。これからも…あなたが拒むことを決断しない限り…魂の海を航海できることを光栄に思います」
languages.original_text: "You are the only one who I trust to hear this confession — the thought of being {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} both frightens and sickens me. How can I manage an entire House if I cannot even control my powers? I... I am just grateful to you for always being close and guiding me to the right path. Thank you, Rogue Trader. It will be an honour to keep guiding your vessel through the Sea of Souls — until you decide otherwise."

traits.locale_text: 「この告白を聞いても構わないと信頼できるのはあなただけです…{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}ノベイター{/g}になることを考えると、怖くもあり、気持ち悪くもあります。自分の力さえコントロールできないのに、どうやって家全体を管理できるのでしょうか？私は…私は、いつも近くにいてくれて正しい道へ導いてくださるあなたに感謝しています。ありがとうございます、ローグトレーダー。これからも…あなたが拒むことを決断しない限り…魂の海を航海できることを光栄に思います」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich würde dieses Geständnis niemals jemand anderem als Euch anvertrauen — der Gedanke, {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novatorin{/g} zu sein, ängstigt mich und widert mich an. Wie kann ich ein ganzes Haus leiten, wenn ich nicht einmal meine Kräfte kontrollieren kann? Ich ... Ich bin nur dankbar, dass Ihr immer in meiner Nähe seid und mich auf den richtigen Pfad führt. Danke, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Es wird eine Ehre sein, Euer Schiff weiter durch das Meer der Seelen zu führen — bis Ihr entscheidet, dass Ihr das nicht mehr wollt."
languages.original_text: "You are the only one who I trust to hear this confession — the thought of being {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} both frightens and sickens me. How can I manage an entire House if I cannot even control my powers? I... I am just grateful to you for always being close and guiding me to the right path. Thank you, Rogue Trader. It will be an honour to keep guiding your vessel through the Sea of Souls — until you decide otherwise."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde dieses Geständnis niemals jemand anderem als Euch anvertrauen — der Gedanke, {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novatorin{/g} zu sein, ängstigt mich und widert mich an. Wie kann ich ein ganzes Haus leiten, wenn ich nicht einmal meine Kräfte kontrollieren kann? Ich ... Ich bin nur dankbar, dass Ihr immer in meiner Nähe seid und mich auf den richtigen Pfad führt. Danke, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Es wird eine Ehre sein, Euer Schiff weiter durch das Meer der Seelen zu führen — bis Ihr entscheidet, dass Ihr das nicht mehr wollt."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Vous êtes bien {mf|le seul|la seule} à qui je peux faire un tel aveu : je me sens à la fois terrifiée et écœurée à l'idée d'être {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}. Comment puis-je espérer gérer toute une maison si je ne suis même pas capable de contrôler mes propres pouvoirs ? Je... Je vous suis reconnaissante d'être {mf|resté|restée} à mes côtés et de m'avoir guidée sur le droit chemin. Merci, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Ce sera un honneur de guider votre vaisseau dans la Mer des Âmes aussi longtemps que vous voudrez de moi. »
languages.original_text: "You are the only one who I trust to hear this confession — the thought of being {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} both frightens and sickens me. How can I manage an entire House if I cannot even control my powers? I... I am just grateful to you for always being close and guiding me to the right path. Thank you, Rogue Trader. It will be an honour to keep guiding your vessel through the Sea of Souls — until you decide otherwise."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes bien {mf|le seul|la seule} à qui je peux faire un tel aveu : je me sens à la fois terrifiée et écœurée à l'idée d'être {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}. Comment puis-je espérer gérer toute une maison si je ne suis même pas capable de contrôler mes propres pouvoirs ? Je... Je vous suis reconnaissante d'être {mf|resté|restée} à mes côtés et de m'avoir guidée sur le droit chemin. Merci, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Ce sera un honneur de guider votre vaisseau dans la Mer des Âmes aussi longtemps que vous voudrez de moi. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Bunu senden başka kimseye itiraf edecek kadar güvenmiyorum... {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Rota Reisi{/g} olma düşüncesi beni hem korkutuyor hem de rahatsız ediyor. Daha kendi güçlerimi kontrol edemezken nasıl olur da koca bir Hane'yi yönetebilirim? Daima yanımda olduğun ve bana doğru yolu gösterdiğin için sana minnettarım. Teşekkür ederim Hür Tacir. Sen istediğin sürece gemine Ruhlar Denizi'nde rehberlik etmek, benim için bir şereftir."
languages.original_text: "You are the only one who I trust to hear this confession — the thought of being {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} both frightens and sickens me. How can I manage an entire House if I cannot even control my powers? I... I am just grateful to you for always being close and guiding me to the right path. Thank you, Rogue Trader. It will be an honour to keep guiding your vessel through the Sea of Souls — until you decide otherwise."

traits.locale_text: "Bunu senden başka kimseye itiraf edecek kadar güvenmiyorum... {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Rota Reisi{/g} olma düşüncesi, beni hem korkutuyor hem de rahatsız ediyor. Daha kendi güçlerimi kontrol edemezken nasıl olur da koca bir Haneyi yönetebilirim? Daima yanımda olduğun ve beni doğru yola yönlendirdiğin için sana minnettarım. Teşekkür ederim Hür Tacir. Sen istediğin sürece gemine Ruhlar Denizi'nde rehberlik etmek, benim için bir şereftir."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
